name: Virgin Protection Magic
description:
Young Gitta wants to be a witch. She helps out people in town and follows the guidance of a senior witch, growing and learning to fulfill her dream. But, it seems like every rite of passage is something sexual. Gitta is innocent. Can she become a witch without sacrificing that? Or is throwing it away the easiest trial in her path to witchdom? You, the player, decide.
​
